name: Gate of Self-Expression
description: The gate of creative role and creative identity, finding one's purpose through self-expression.

when_activated.guidance: Trust your unique creative voice and express yourself authentically
when_activated.warning: Avoid forcing creative expression when it doesn't flow naturally

when_undefined.guidance: Explore different forms of expression to discover what resonates
when_undefined.opportunity: Flexibility to adapt creative expression to different contexts

stress_response.recommended_action: Reconnect with authentic self through creative practices
